author: Mariano Licudine
description: For those seeking the shaken version previously above:Glass: CoupeGarnish: Orange zest twistHow to make: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.60ml (2oz) Light white rum22.5ml (.75oz) Orange juice15ml (.5oz) Lime juice7.5 (.25oz) Sugar syrup
name: Derby Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and fine strain into chilled glass
